comments: awesome song

Doesn't get much better than this. Chill.
tl;dr Antonio Carlos Jobim is a god and is sorely underappreciated in this shoutbox.

It's Brazilian Portuguese. You might also have noticed that the only people referring to it as Brazilian in this sb are people from Brazil and Portugal, the only countries that speak Portuguese. And, surprise, they're calling it Brazilian as a means of distinguishing one from another. So what's the deal with the comments here?
